title: nubia Z70S Ultra teaser is out, 35mm main camera is in along with Avengers branding
description: nubia is preparing to release the Z70S Ultra Photographer Edition next month, as a newly released teaser says today. This also includes the word Avengers, which implies a collaboration with Marvel, but maybe it's just a sneaky way to get some attention. The phone's main camera will have a 35mm equivalent focal length, according to recent rumors. The teaser also confirms this as you can see below. text: nubia is preparing to release the Z70S Ultra Photographer Edition next month, as a newly released teaser says today. This also includes the word Avengers, which implies a collaboration with Marvel, but maybe it's just a sneaky way to get some attention. The phone's main camera will have a 35mm equivalent focal length, according to recent rumors. The teaser also confirms this as you can see below. The brand says it will be using a new large sensor for the main camera too, which will make for an interesting pairing with the 35mm focal length. As the device has already been certified for sale in China by TENAA, we know its rear will look like the picture above. The main camera is, as you can see, very prominently featured, and the entire design is halfway between a recent nubia device and a classic camera. It's unclear what its other specs are, but since this is also an Ultra, we expect it to borrow quite a few of them from the Z70 Ultra which launched back in November. html:
nubia is preparing to release the Z70S Ultra Photographer Edition next month, as a newly released teaser says today. This also includes the word Avengers, which implies a collaboration with Marvel, but maybe it's just a sneaky way to get some attention.

The phone's main camera will have a 35mm equivalent focal length, according to recent rumors. The teaser also confirms this as you can see below.

The brand says it will be using a new large sensor for the main camera too, which will make for an interesting pairing with the 35mm focal length.

As the device has already been certified for sale in China by TENAA, we know its rear will look like the picture above. The main camera is, as you can see, very prominently featured, and the entire design is halfway between a recent nubia device and a classic camera.

It's unclear what its other specs are, but since this is also an Ultra, we expect it to borrow quite a few of them from the Z70 Ultra which launched back in November.

ZTE nubia Z70 Ultra

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
512GB 16GB RAM$ 869.00£ 829.00
256GB 12GB RAM£ 749.00€ 876.99
Show all prices

That phone has a 6.85-inch 144 Hz AMOLED screen with 2,000-nit peak brightness, the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset at the helm, 12/16/24GB of RAM, 256GB/512GB/1TB of storage, and a 6,150 mAh battery with support for 80W wired charging.

Source (in Chinese) | Via
